General.Name: Qingdao Gon Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Gon Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of modified plastic particles and products, and functional plastic plates in China and internationally. The company's products portfolio includes glassfiber reinforced polypropylene (PP), PP, glassfiber reinforced AS, glassfiber reinforced ABS, and flame retardant PC/ABS products; and air-conditioner components, washing machine components, TV rear covers, air-conditioner panels, centrifugal fans and blades, axial flow fans, automotive straflo blades, straflo blades, axial blades, and axial fan blades. It also offers organic polymer modified materials, organic polymer composite materials, green petrochemical materials and new materials, gelatin, collagen and related derivatives, biomedicine and health care products, etc. Qingdao Gon Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Qingdao, China.
